title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Learning Object-Based Mathematics Curriculum Design: Set Covering Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Classify learning objects by analyzing their attributes (content/technical) with over 80% accuracy
Design optimal learning object combinations for at least five math topics (e.g., equations, geometry) applying set covering techniques
Select at least three alternative learning materials using similarity measurement criteria and evaluate their suitability for educational purposes
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
